item.title: Deep pothole about 1/2 long but deep, 17th January
item.description:
I noticed this pothole at the beginning of the week,it is very hard to see in the dark and when a bus approaches from the opposite direction there is a chance you would go down it and cause damage to the tyre or wheel of the car.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brampton Road, Bexleyheath
